item.description:
After trying Kelly's last week (some say they make THE BEST lobster roll) Doug and I both ordered the "famous" lobster roll.
A good amout of meat! Tasted "good".
They say it contains the lobster of 2 one pound lobsters!
Very true!!

Now it's time to try the place I SAY makes an EVEN BETTER LOBSTER ROLL!
The place is JP's in Westborough where Rt 9 crosses over Rt. 135 it's located in a large strip mall next to "The Mill Store" (they sell unfinished furnature) and a bunch of other places too.
JP's is CASH ONLY!!!
Plan on spending about $16 for the lobster roll but it's well worth it and then some!

Please join us if you can. If you think you know of a better place than JP's then the Quest to find the BEST LOBSTER ROLL will have to go on to Part 3.... 4.....5....etc
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Black and Red 2008 Suzuki Burgman 400
item.name: Quest to find THE BEST LOBSTER ROLL! (Part 2)
